name: Cube Soccor 2
description:
!NOTICE!  You need 2 players to play.

Cube soccor 2 is a sequel to a really bad game i made about a year ago.

You bounce the ball with you boxy head into the goal 5 times to win!

Player 1 controls

---------------------

WASD - Move & jump

Space - Kick

-------------------

Player 2 controls

--------------------

Arrow Keys - Move & jump

Ctrl - Kick

-------------------
